comment.author: 12853714@N08
comment._content: Suspect that this is a sedge (Cyperaceae) rather than a grass.

comment.author: 81034794@N03
comment._content: This is Cyperaceae: Cyperus aggregatus (Willd.) Endl.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you, DCTropics and sedge_man!  This is great information and a definite resemblance to that species.  Thanks for all of your input on these images!

Carolyn
